ConfigurationOption.Value:
select * from ( select pl.receiptscomplete, pl.ponum, pl.polinenum, pl.itemnum, pl.description, null status, null quantity, pl.orderqty, pl.receivedqty, pl.rejectedqty, pl.linetype, (select quantity from matrectrans where ponum = pl.ponum and status = 'WINSP' and polinenum = pl.polinenum) winsp, pl.orderunit, pl.remark, pl.storeloc, iv.binnum, pl.catalogcode, pl.modelnum, pl.manufacturer, null issuetype, pl.inspectionrequired, pl.siteid, pl.polineid, po.poid, null matrectransid from poline pl left join po on pl.ponum = po.ponum and pl.siteid = po.siteid left outer join inventory iv on pl.itemnum = iv.itemnum and pl.storeloc = iv.location and pl.siteid = iv.siteid and pl.orgid = iv.orgid where pl.receiptscomplete = 0 and pl.orderqty > coalesce( ( select sum(quantity) from matrectrans m where m.ponum = pl.ponum and m.polinenum = pl.polinenum and m.siteid = pl.siteid and m.status in ( 'WINSP', 'WASSET' ) and m.issuetype= 'RECEIPT' ), 0 )
union
select pl.receiptscomplete, pl.ponum, pl.polinenum, pl.itemnum, pl.description, m.status, m.quantity, pl.orderqty, pl.receivedqty, m.rejectqty rejectedqty, pl.linetype, (select quantity from matrectrans where ponum = pl.ponum and status = 'WINSP' and polinenum = pl.polinenum) winsp, pl.orderunit, m.remark, pl.storeloc, iv.binnum, pl.catalogcode, pl.modelnum, pl.manufacturer, m.issuetype, pl.inspectionrequired, pl.siteid, pl.polineid, po.poid, m.matrectransid from poline pl left join po on pl.ponum = po.ponum and pl.siteid = po.siteid left join matrectrans m on pl.ponum = m.ponum and pl.polinenum = m.polinenum and pl.siteid = m.siteid left outer join inventory iv on pl.itemnum = iv.itemnum and pl.storeloc = iv.location and pl.siteid = iv.siteid and pl.orgid = iv.orgid where m.issuetype = 'RECEIPT' ) x

Struct._value: ${matrectransid} is not null and ( IsModified( "Status" ) or ${Status} != 'COMP' )
${matrectransid} is not null or ${Quantity} is not null
